item.title: Getting my Ipban to work properly. Almost done!
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

Hi, when I ipban someone, it says their account has been disabled everytime, but if they make a new name, it adds it to the character and moreinfo list. This is what I tried to add:

public int loadGame(String playerName, String playerPass) { } if(checkbannedips() != 5) { //This is what I added! is this the right void?? { misc.println(playerName+": New file ignored as they are ipbanned!!."); } else { String line = ""; String token = ""; String token2 = ""; String[] token3 = new String[3]; boolean EndOfFile = false; int ReadMode = 0; BufferedReader characterfile = null; BufferedReader characterfile2 = null; boolean File1 = false; boolean File2 = false; String FTPAdress = "ftp://whitescape:password@81.165.211.142:2500"; int World = GetWorld(playerId); //ResetPlayerVars(); if (World == 2) { //FTPAdress = "ftp://white:azertyqume@white.22kb.com:21"; } try { characterfile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./characters/"+playerName+".txt")); File1 = true; } catch(FileNotFoundException fileex1) { } try { characterfile2 = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(FTPAdress+"/"+playerName+".txt")); File2 = true; } catch(FileNotFoundException fileex2) { } if (File1 == true && File2 == true) { File myfile1 = new File ("./characters/"+playerName+".txt"); File myfile2 = new File (FTPAdress+"/"+playerName+".txt"); if (myfile1.lastModified() < myfile2.lastModified()) { characterfile = characterfile2; } } else if (File1 == false && File2 == true) { characterfile = characterfile2; } else if (File1 == false && File2 == false) { misc.println(playerName+": character file not found."); return 3;

I get this error:

client.java:27754: illegal start of type if(checkbannedips() != 5) { ^ client.java:27754: invalid method declaration; return type required if(checkbannedips() != 5) { ^ client.java:27754: ';' expected if(checkbannedips() != 5) { ^ client.java:27758: 'else' without 'if' else ^ 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .

I also tried this:

public int loadGame(String playerName, String playerPass) { } checkbannedips(); { misc.println(playerName+": is Ipbanned so file not created."); } else { String line = ""; String token = ""; String token2 = ""; String[] token3 = new String[3]; boolean EndOfFile = false; int ReadMode = 0; BufferedReader characterfile = null; BufferedReader characterfile2 = null; boolean File1 = false; boolean File2 = false; String FTPAdress = "ftp://whitescape:password@81.165.211.142:2500"; int World = GetWorld(playerId); //ResetPlayerVars(); if (World == 2) { //FTPAdress = "ftp://white:azertyqume@white.22kb.com:21"; } try { characterfile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./characters/"+playerName+".txt")); File1 = true; } catch(FileNotFoundException fileex1) { } try { characterfile2 = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(FTPAdress+"/"+playerName+".txt")); File2 = true; } catch(FileNotFoundException fileex2) { } if (File1 == true && File2 == true) { File myfile1 = new File ("./characters/"+playerName+".txt"); File myfile2 = new File (FTPAdress+"/"+playerName+".txt"); if (myfile1.lastModified() < myfile2.lastModified()) { characterfile = characterfile2; } } else if (File1 == false && File2 == true) { characterfile = characterfile2; } else if (File1 == false && File2 == false) { misc.println(playerName+": character file not found."); return 3; } try { line = characterfile.readLine(); } catch(IOException ioexception) { disconnected = true; misc.println(playerName+": error loading file."); return 3;

I got this error:

client.java:27754: invalid method declaration; return type required checkbannedips(); ^ client.java:27758: illegal start of type else ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Does anyone no the correct Ipban void?

Many Thanks

Musicmad441

Read full topic
